meanings.definition: The state or quality of being profitable.
meanings.sent1: The profitablenesses of the business were evident in its steady growth.
meanings.sent2: Investors look for profitablenesses when deciding where to put their money.
meanings.sent3: The profitablenesses of the lemonade stand made the kids feel like successful entrepreneurs.
meanings.sent4: Her idea had the profitablenesses of a gold mine waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The profitablenesses of the stock market can fluctuate greatly.

meanings.sent1: Understanding the profitablenesses of a product is crucial for a business to succeed.
meanings.sent2: The company's profitablenesses allowed it to expand its operations.
meanings.sent3: The profitablenesses of the vending machine surprised everyone with its high returns.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had the profitablenesses of a well-oiled money-making machine.
meanings.sent5: The profitablenesses of the new investment strategy were immediately apparent.

meanings.sent1: The profitablenesses of the real estate market attracted many investors.
meanings.sent2: She saw the profitablenesses in starting her own online store.
meanings.sent3: The profitablenesses of the lottery ticket gave him hope for a better future.
meanings.sent4: His eyes gleamed with the profitablenesses of the hidden treasure he had just discovered.
meanings.sent5: The profitablenesses of the side hustle became evident as extra income started flowing in.
